title: Minor variations referred heroto shall include the following:

items.description: Inclusion of product (finished or raw material) and/or product line
Inclusion of sources (including toll manufacturer/repacker, trader)
Inclusion of activity e.g. from Manufacturer to Toll Manufacturer/Repacker/Importer/Exporter or Trader to Trader/Importer/ Exporter (raw materials and bulk products)
Change in business name/address of the source
Change of key personnel for Quality Assurance, Quality Control, Production Manager, Authorized Person and Pharmacist
Deletion of product, source and/or activity

title: Major variations, as enumerated below, shall require re-issuance of License as these are reflected in the License form itself:

items.description: Transfer of location of the establishment

Re-classification of the establishment (e.g. from Distributor/Importer to Distributor/Wholesaler), except for those which were reclassified into another class of establishment (e.g. from Distributor/Importer/ Wholesaler to Trader/
